backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles and per-user composition storage with access control and CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature mapping file linking implemented recording and UI features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files across the studio, composer, recording, and audio systems.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining color variables, themes, and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with metadata, favicon, and main script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component managing authentication, profile setup, studio UI, composer mode, and video/audio recorder dialogs.
frontend/src/audio/audioImport.ts: Utility functions for validating, reading, and extracting metadata from imported audio files.
frontend/src/audio/audioTypes.ts: TypeScript interfaces defining structure for composition state, channels, piano roll notes, amp settings, and imported audio.
Serialization utilities encoding composition state to bytes and restoring it with defaults for backward compatibility.
frontend/src/audio/useAudioEngine.ts: Hook that initializes and controls a Web Audio engine, manages gain nodes, guitar amp effects, playback state, and imported audio handling.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginButton.t: UI button that toggles login/logout using Internet Identity and manages query cache clearing.
frontend/src/features/composer/AudioTrac: Component for importing, validating, previewing, and removing external audio files in a composition.
frontend/src/features/composer/ComposerS: Main composer UI combining piano roll and audio import tabs with playback controls and layout.
frontend/src/features/composer/PianoRoll: Piano roll editor that manages note creation, deletion, zooming, and rendering of the grid and notes.
frontend/src/features/recording/AudioRec: Dialog for recording audio with controls for start, pause, stop, playback, and error handling.
frontend/src/features/recording/useAudio: Custom hook managing audio recording with MediaRecorder, duration tracking, error handling, and optional MP3 conversion.
frontend/src/features/recording/useVideo: Custom hook for video recording, supporting optional audio tracks, duration tracking, stopping, clearing, and downloading recordings.
frontend/src/features/recording/VideoRec: React dialog wrapping camera preview and video recording controls with quality, audio toggle, error handling, and playback.
frontend/src/features/studio/AmpPanel.ts: UI panel for guitar amp settings with interactive knobs, sliders, and a reset option.
frontend/src/features/studio/Composition: Component for saving, loading, and deleting compositions, displaying a list and handling composition persistence.
frontend/src/features/studio/InstrumentP: Renders interactive drum and instrument note grids with toggles and step highlighting, handling updates via callbacks.
Displays channel strips with volume, mute, and solo controls plus a master volume slider.
frontend/src/features/studio/TransportBa: Provides play/pause control and a tempo slider for transport functions.
frontend/src/features/studio/YouTubePlay: Handles YouTube URL/ID search and displays an embedded player or search guidance.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCompositions.ts: Provides hooks to list, save, load, and delete compositions through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, exposing login, logout, and identity context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides hooks to load and save the caller's user profile using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and theme variables for light/dark modes and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, query client, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), store/retrieve them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project’s state, including requirements, features, images, and architecture notes for building a media‑recording website.
